price: (37) Indeed in that is a reminder for whoever has a heart or who listens while he is present [in mind].
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكۡرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلۡبٌ أَوۡ أَلۡقَى ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika ladhik'rā liman kāna lahu qalbun aw alqā al-samʿa wahuwa shahīdun
